review: this movie showcases the real life of people who are unwillingly but for survival working as bar dancers with no option left for them. the end makes every one cry and tabu has done a great piece of acting which is really admirable

excellent movie with powerful, natural performance. tabu is outstanding madhur bhandarkar is one of the best director whose films reflects the reality of those people which we rarely knows i am a great fan of him

one of my all time favourite hindi films..a masterpiece..showcases how the vicious cycle of the underbelly life of a city traps people for generations...and how the system opresses rather than helping....
powerful script..amazing peeformances..so closer to reality
i've never knew that there are females who literally lives in this kind of atmosphere and do these works when their destiny knocks them down ..

poignant story that illustrates why social mobility is so hard for the underprivileged....

another great movie from madhur bhandarkar.
tabu is an acting genius..!! so beautifully portrayed the role of mumtaz.
films are a reflection of the society. if you need an example, watch this masterpiece.the last voice-over by tabu haunts a viewer even after the movie ends.
very nice film . tabbu best performance in the film
this the real images of the societies are portrayed. acting of tabbu is extraordinary and it comes out real phases of a bar dancer.
a masterpiece movie and a well played character by tabu
very nice movie....n like real one...tabu acting...mind blowing excellent
very nice and real film i like it
best movie i had ever watched , best masterpiece.
it is great movie , a must watch
this movie shows how an indian woman suffers, because suffering is written in her destiny
its a great movie, painful to digest to mind, about  women life in india perception of men
